class.name: B4R::B4RMAX6675
class.comment: rMAX6675 - B4R Library MAX6675. Wrapped from this open source library https://www.arduino.cc/reference/en/libraries/max6675-library/ (https://github.com/adafruit/MAX6675-library) Notes: The MAX6675 requires a delay of 250ms between updates.

method.name: Initialize
method.comment: Initialize the MAX6675 module. SCK - Pin Serial Clock CS - Pin Chip Select SO - Pin Serial Output

method.name: ReadCelsius
method.comment: Read temperature in degrees Celsius. Returns Temperature C as double.

method.name: ReadFahrenheit
method.comment: Read temperature in degrees Fahrenheit. Returns Temperature F as double.
